cqs: How many relations are there between c1 and c2 that op2 nothing but c3?
How many things could c1 do with c2 that op2 nothing but c3?
How many things may c1 do with c2 that op2 nothing but c3?
How many relations are described between c1 and c2 that op2 nothing but c3?
How many things can c1 do with c2 that op2 nothing but c3?
How many relations exist between c1 and c2 that op2 nothing but c3?
How many relations are proposed between c1 and c2 that op2 nothing but c3?
How many relations are available between c1 and c2 that op2 nothing but c3?
How many relations are there between c1 and c2 that op2 nothing but c3?
How many things could c1 do with c2 that op2 nothing but c3?
How many things may c1 do with c2 that op2 nothing but c3?
How many relations are described between c1 and c2 that op2 nothing but c3?
How many things can c1 do with c2 that op2 nothing but c3?
How many relations exist between c1 and c2 that op2 nothing but c3?
How many relations are proposed between c1 and c2 that op2 nothing but c3?
How many relations are available between c1 and c2 that op2 nothing but c3?
query: SELECT (COUNT(?x) AS ?cnt) WHERE { <c1> rdfs:subClassOf [ rdf:type owl:Restriction ; owl:onProperty ?x ; owl:someValuesFrom [ owl:intersectionOf ( <c2> [ rdf:type owl:Restriction ; owl:onProperty <op2> ; owl:allValuesFrom <c3> ] ) ] ] . }
